BNC User Reference Guide

<gap>

gap (omitted material) indicates a point where material has been omitted from the transcription.
Class model.global.edit att.editLike
Declaration 
element gap
{
   attribute desc { text }?,
   attribute reason { text }?,
   att.editLike.attribute.resp,
   empty
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes and those inherited from [att.editLike ] )
desc briefly describes the material which has been omitted.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1) text
reason gives further details of the reason for omission.
Status: Optional
Example
 <gap desc="address" resp="OUP"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"/>
Module core
